name: Black Spec Ops - 3D Game
description:
Black Spec Ops - 3D Game is finally released on iOS !

Full 3D World To Explore

THIS GAME HAS MANY LEVELS WITH UNIQUE GAMEPLAY!

You have to climb the Obstacle-Stairs to space!

WATCH OUT SOME LEVELS THE FLOOR TURNS LAVA, TRY NOT TO TOUCH THE LAVA!

SERIOUSLY YOU NEVER PLAYED A GAME THIS GOOD!

The 3D Worlds are filled with mutant zombies, they guard perimeters around the voxel tanks try to jump on them!

Game is equipped with on screen controls. Move around with the on-screen joystick. Camera auto rotates to your position.

AMAZING TOP NOTCH 3D WORLD ! A MUST DOWNLOAD !

Multiplayer coming in next update!
----------------------------------------------------
We'd like to thank our Development, Design, and Management team members for their wonderful work on this project.
Thank you for downloading! We appreciate your continued support. Thank you to Fallen Apps!
We appreciate you positive feedback and are working hard to develop your ideas into future updates.
